chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall T : System, Inconsistent LNN T -> wInconsistent T

Premises:
Inconsistent : forall L : Language, fol.System L -> Prop
System = fol.System LNN : Type
wInconsistent = fun T : System => exists (f : Formula) (v : nat), (forall x : nat, In x (freeVarFormula LNN f) -> v = x) /\ SysPrf T (existH v (notH f)) /\ (forall n : nat, SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v (natToTerm n))) : System -> Prop
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
wCon2Con : forall T : System, wConsistent T -> Consistent LNN T
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
forallI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)
existSys : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN g) -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) g -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (existH v f)) g
wConsistent = fun T : System => forall (f : Formula) (v : nat), (forall x : nat, In x (freeVarFormula LNN f) -> v = x) -> SysPrf T (existH v (notH f)) -> exists n : nat, ~ SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v (natToTerm n)) : System -> Prop
existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t)
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
andI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (andH f g)
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
nnI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH (notH f))
nnE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), SysPrf T (notH (notH f)) -> SysPrf T f
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T f
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Ensembles.Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
eqTrans : forall (T : System) (a b c : Term), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal b c) -> SysPrf T (equal a c)
impTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T (impH f h)
iffTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g h) -> SysPrf T (iffH f h)
folLogic.contradiction : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L), folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.notH L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T g
andE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T g
orI1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
andE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (andH f g) -> SysPrf T f
orI2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (orH f g)
existSimp : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (existH v f)

```coq
intros T H.
unfold wInconsistent.
destruct H as [f [v [H1 [H2 H3]]]].
exists f, v.
split; [split; [exact H1 | exact H2] | exact H3].
Qed.```

original: intros T H. unfold wInconsistent. destruct H as [f [v [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. exists f, v. split; [split; [apply H1 | apply H2] | apply H3].
